name: Balloon Mash
description:
Have fun mashing the keyboard and making balloons appear, in this game-toy aimed at younger children (but fun for grown ups too)!

Use the keyboard keys to make balloons appear.  Each key triggers different colours, and balloons appear according to the position of the key on the keyboard.

Older children can use the mouse to click on and pop balloons! Can you stop all the balloons from reaching the top of the screen?

There are no rules!  Just have fun!

Music is a royalty free performance of Bach's cello concerto #1 prelude
